hero.title: MORE THAN STANDARD
hero.subtitle: Comfortable beds as big as an airport, practical kitchen and rotating front seats. Enjoy every kilometer in our luxury caravans.

about_section.who_text: We are a family company with experience in caravanning. Our goal is to provide you with comfortable, safe and unforgettable travel.
about_section.what_text: Modern caravan rental with complete equipment (from cutlery to awning).

new_caravan_section.main_title: We have a brand new caravan for you!
new_caravan_section.main_text: We are pleased to announce that we have a brand new caravan. This modern and fully equipped model will provide you with maximum comfort and safety on the road. Take advantage of this unique opportunity and experience an unforgettable adventure with our new caravan.
new_caravan_section.closing_text: Our luxury motorhome is ideal for families, couples and everyone who longs for independence and comfort on the road. Book it today and experience the perfect adventure without worries!

features.section_title: Dream family vacation with a proper caravan?

feature1.title: Unlimited KM
feature1.description: Travel without limits with our generous mileage options.

feature2.title: Higher Standard
feature2.description: Modern, clean, and well-maintained RVs for your comfort.

feature3.title: Additional Equipment
feature3.description: From kitchen kits to bike racks, we have the extras you need.

feature4.title: Your Car With Us
feature4.description: Secure parking available for your vehicle while you travel.

cta_section.title: Plan your dream family vacation.
cta_section.subtitle: Contact us today and book your caravan!

page_title.home: Viac Ako Štandard RV Rentals - Your Adventure Starts Here

caravanning_page.title: Caravanning – Freedom on Wheels!
caravanning_page.subtitle: Discover the unique combination of freedom, comfort and adventure
caravanning_page.intro_text: Caravan travel has become an increasingly popular way to explore the world in recent years. It offers a unique combination of freedom, comfort and adventure that traditional forms of travel simply cannot provide. Imagine having your home always with you – wherever you park, you are at home.
caravanning_page.benefit_2_desc: Your own bed and kitchen always with you
caravanning_page.independence_text: One of the greatest advantages of a caravan is complete independence. You don't have to follow hotel or restaurant opening hours, you don't have to book accommodation in advance. You can set off spontaneously, according to your current mood or weather. If you like a place, simply stay longer. If something doesn't appeal to you, continue on – without stress and restrictions.
caravanning_page.quote_1: Wherever you park, you are at home.
caravanning_page.comfort_text: A caravan provides comfort that every family will appreciate. You have your own bed, your own bathroom, kitchen, refrigerator and storage space. You don't have to pack and unpack suitcases at every location, everything is always at hand. Children can take their favorite toys, and every family member has their privacy.
caravanning_page.savings_text: Another great advantage is cost savings. Although the initial costs of renting or buying a caravan may be higher, in the long run you save on accommodation, meals and transportation. You can cook your own meals, sleep in nature or at campsites, and visit more places in less time.
caravanning_page.ecological_text: Caravan travel is also more ecological than flying and allows you to discover lesser-known places off the tourist trails. You can wake up by a lake, have lunch with a mountain view, and park by the sea in the evening – all in one day. Thanks to the caravan, every trip becomes a personal story full of experiences that you would never have in a hotel.
caravanning_page.quote_2: You can wake up by a lake, have lunch with a mountain view, and park by the sea in the evening – all in one day.
caravanning_page.lifestyle_text: Finally, the caravan lifestyle encourages slowing down and returning to simpler values – time spent with family, connection with nature, and a sense of true freedom. It's an adventure that will teach you to be flexible, grateful, and open to the world.
caravanning_page.closing_text: If you've never traveled by caravan before, perhaps now is the right time to try it. Just start the engine, and the journey begins!
caravanning_page.cta_subtitle: Browse our modern caravan and choose the date for your dream journey.

storage_notice.message: This website uses local storage to improve your experience, such as remembering your language preference and visitor status.

rvs_page.title: Ford Siena 395 F
rvs_page.subtitle: Browse our modern and comfortable RV. Please contact us to confirm availability for your desired dates.

pricing_page.title: Rental Pricing
pricing_page.subtitle: Transparent pricing for your perfect RV adventure. Rates vary by season and rental duration.
pricing_page.pricing_note: Discounts may apply for weekly or long-term rentals. Minimum rental periods may apply during peak season. All prices are indicative and subject to change. Please contact us for a precise quote.
pricing_page.addons_note: Add-ons are subject to availability. Please request when booking.
pricing_page.terms_note: Please review our full Terms & Conditions for complete details before booking.

contact_page.title: Contact Us
contact_page.subtitle: Have questions or ready to inquire about an RV rental? We'd love to hear from you!
contact_page.name: Name
contact_page.subject: Subject
contact_page.message_placeholder: Please include your desired rental dates, number of travelers, and preferred RV if known...

rv_detail.rates_vary: Rates vary by season. See full pricing details.
rv_detail.availability_note: Please contact us to check availability for your desired dates.
